services.description: Wide range of capital projects delivered on time and within budget. Project planning, execution, and quality assurance.
Reactive maintenance (emergency equipment repair, production interruption resolution) and proactive maintenance (custom routine programs, inspection scheduling, preventive planning).
Flexible staffing solutions providing millwrights, ironworkers, welders, maintenance mechanics, and general laborers for any duration.
Custom fabrication from customer specifications/blueprints or in-house design solutions. Emphasis on safety, quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.
Specialized rigging and installation for heavy industrial equipment with in-house laser alignment. One-stop shop for equipment installation needs.
Pipe welding specializing in carbon steel, stainless steel, and titanium. Capabilities include repair, modification, new pipe builds, and hot tapping.
Precision laser alignment using latest Leica technology to prevent premature equipment wear and failure.
24/7 field service including air system audits, flow analysis, and service for air compressors, PD blowers, vacuum pumps, and ancillary equipment. Factory-trained and certified technicians.
Regularly scheduled PM services with proprietary tracking database, proactive scheduling, and free spectrographic oil analysis every 1,000 hours. 24/7 emergency support.
Full service repair for all major brands, 5-500 HP. On-site or in-shop service with diagnostic evaluation, parts ordering, and expert repairs.
Rebuild services for Gardner Denver, Roots, and Tuthill brand blowers, on-site or in-shop.
Specialized rebuild services for Hoffman Lamson centrifugal blowers.
Dedicated rebuild services for Elmo Rietschle vacuum equipment.
Redesign and rewind for AC and DC motors from fractional HP through 20,000 HP, weights up to 40 tons. Since 1931.

Babbitt bearing repair services for industrial rotating equipment.
Specialized repair for switched reluctance motors.
Industrial magnet repair services.

On-site machining services with expert technicians bringing tools and equipment to customer location to minimize disruptions.
Precision laser alignment services for industrial equipment.
Vibration analysis and diagnostic services for rotating equipment.
Infrared thermography inspection of electrification systems and control panels.
PdMA motor analysis and condition-based testing services.
Electric motor engineering and custom design services.

Industrial equipment rigging, installation, and removal services.
Energy efficiency consulting and motor upgrade recommendations.
Fall protection systems and safety services.
Rigging services for heavy industrial equipment.
Generator repair, testing, and maintenance services.
Custom automation packages built through factory relationships with supporting documentation and asset tracking.
Three National Board and ASME certified repair locations with quality processes approved by National Board.
Uses AVK equipment for valves exceeding standard test stand capabilities.
Refurbishes conservation vents, flame arrestors, and similar equipment to like-new condition.
In-house repair for gate, globe, and check valves exceeding 72". Includes parts replacement and hydro-testing.
Valve sizing and automation design, custom bracket and coupling fabrication using factory parts exclusively.
